mapper.select: select no, user_no as userNo, alarm_type as alarmType, alarm_contents as alarmContents, alarm_check as alarmCheck, alarm_date as alarmDate from alarm where user_no = (select U.no from user U where U.id = #{id}) and alarm_check = 'uncheck' order by alarm_date desc

select no, user_no as userNo, alarm_type as alarmType, alarm_contents as alarmContents, alarm_check as alarmCheck, alarm_date as alarmDate from alarm where no = ( select no from alarm A where A.user_no = (select U.no from user U where U.id = #{userId}) and A.alarm_type = #{alarmType} and A.alarm_check = 'uncheck' and A.alarm_contents = #{alarmContents} order by alarm_date desc limit 0, 1 )

choose.when: update alarm set alarm_check = 'check' where user_no = (select U.no from user U where U.id = #{id}) and no = #{no}
choose.otherwise: update alarm set alarm_check = 'check' where user_no = (select U.no from user U where U.id = #{id})

mapper.select: select a.id as id, b.nickname as nickname from user a, profile b where a.no = b.user_no and a.no = #{no}
